query:
SELECT 
  pw.id as wave_id,
  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status as wave_status,
  pw.totalItems,
  COUNT(pwi.id) as total_items_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pw.id = pwi.waveId
WHERE pw.status IN ('pending', 'picking')
GROUP BY pw.id
ORDER BY pw.id DESC
LIMIT 5;

  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status as wave_status,
  pw.totalItems,
  COUNT(pwi.id) as total_items_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pw.id = pwi.waveId
WHERE pw.status IN ('pending', 'picking')
GROUP BY pw.id
ORDER BY pw.id DESC
LIMIT 5;
